title: EVALUATION OF THE SUCCESS OF IMPLEMENTATION OF ELECTRONIC MEDICAL RECORDS AT RSUP Dr. SITANALA WITH USER SATISFACTION AS AN …
details: W Susilowati, RA Pamungkas, I Jusat - TOPLAMA, 2025
abstract: This study aims to assess the success of EMR implementation based on user satisfaction and net benefits, as well as to determine the supporting and inhibiting factors in EMR implementation. This study uses a quantitative method with cross …
